BioJS

How to use a BioJS Component?

Protein Features Viewer

1. The HTML

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
    </head>
    
    <body>
        <div id="myDiv"/>
    </body>
</html>

We need an HTML element such as <div> or <span> that can act as a container where the component will be located.

2. The CSS

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <link href="http://ebi-uniprot.github.io/CDN/feature-viewer/css/main.css"/>
        <link href="http://ebi-uniprot.github.io/CDN/feature-viewer/css/fontello.css"/>
    </head>
    
    <body>
        <div id="myDiv"/>
    </body>
</html>

We need to link the css files.

3. The JavaScript

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <link href="http://ebi-uniprot.github.io/CDN/feature-viewer/css/main.css"/>
        <link href="http://ebi-uniprot.github.io/CDN/feature-viewer/css/fontello.css"/>
        
        <script src="http://ebi-uniprot.github.io/CDN/feature-viewer/featuresviewer.js">
    </script>
    
        <script>
            window.onload = function() {
                var yourDiv = document.getElementById('yourDiv');
                var biojs_vis_proteinFeaturesViewer = require('biojs-vis-proteinfeaturesviewer');
                var instance = new biojs_vis_proteinFeaturesViewer({
                    el: yourDiv,
                    uniprotacc : 'P05067'
                });
            }
        </script>
    
    </head>
    
    <body>
        <div id="myDiv"/>
    </body>
</html>

Finally, we need to link the js files and initialize the component.

<html>
    <head>
    </head>
    
    <body>
        <div id="myDiv"/>
    </body>
</html>
                   
                   
<script src="http://ebi-uniprot.github.io/CDN/feature-viewer/featuresviewer.js"></script>
